paragraphs.text: This page indexes the individual year in film pages. Each year is annotated with its significant events.

paragraphs.title: 19th century in film
paragraphs.text:
Before Muybridge's 1878 work, photo sequences were not recorded in real-time because light-sensitive emulsions needed a long exposure time. The sequences were basically made as time-lapse recordings. 
It is possible that people at the time actually viewed such photographs come to life with a ph√©nakisticope or zoetrope (this certainly happened with Muybridge's work).
